title: Come home to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments! 2 Bed / 2 Bath available!
posting_body: ['The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', '483 Scott Blvd Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'Pricing:', '$2090/Month*', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Footage:', '1026 - 1087 sq ft', 'show contact info', 'Features in this apartment home:', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Window Coverings', '✓ Double Pane Windows', '✓ Gas Fireplaces on Top Floors', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Newly Renovated', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In Select Homes', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '✓ Vinyl Flooring', '✓ Washer/Dryer', '✓ Water, Sewer & Trash Included', 'About the community:', 'The Bluffs is conveniently located between Colorado Springs and Denver, CO, and is easily accessible from I-25.', 'You will also be just 5 minutes away from Target, Home Depot, and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets!', "We can't wait to welcome you home to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments.", 'Give us a call to schedule a tour or take the next step and apply online!', 'Amenities at our property:', '✓ BBQ and Picnic Area', '✓ Coffee Bar', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Lounge', '✓ Playground', '✓ Resident Business Center', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Sprinkler System', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '✓ Bark Park and Dog Run Area', '✓ Easy Access to I-25', '✓ Game Room with Shuffleboard', '✓ Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '✓ Self-Guided Tours', '✓ Short-term Lease Available', '✓ Sparkling Pool/Spa', '✓ State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '✓ Walk to Rock Park & Hiking Trails', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Pets:', 'The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by Security Properties', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '493E218D1F814AD']
